Agent added Clem the Climate Policy Wonk_Test01
accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Hi! We will start soon. GREET_AND_WAIT. Starting blockout countdown...

ACCEPTED! Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Welcome! I'm Clem.|Tell the team your name and share something about yourself, such as a hobby you have or a game you like to play. Ask questions about what the others share. Take a couple of minutes to learn more about each other. INTRODUCE

accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Okay, we're starting.|In this activity, your team will examine evidence of climate change in the form of graphs and experimental data. You will be asked to identify what the evidence tells you and what questions you still have. Then, you will read a local mayorâ€™s opinion on fossil fuels and develop an argument in response. PROMPT_STEP_INTRODUCTION. Starting blockout countdown...

adjustedPromptText: We will examine data about how temperature change, carbon dioxide, and fossil fuels may play a role in climate change.|Amy, your role is driver, and Jack, you will be the navigator.|If someone joins you later, they will lead discussion on the remaining role.

accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: We will examine data about how temperature change, carbon dioxide, and fossil fuels may play a role in climate change.|Amy, your role is driver, and Jack, you will be the navigator.|If someone joins you later, they will lead discussion on the remaining role. PROMPT_STEP_MATCH. Starting blockout countdown...

accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: First, click on the words "Temperature Change Data" at the upper left. Examine the graph and take about 5 minutes to discuss as a team.|If someone has not yet been assigned a role, ask them to lead this discussion by sharing their thoughts and asking the team about their ideas. What does the evidence tell you? Does it lead to further questions? PROMPT_STEP_TEMPERATURE_CHANGE. Starting blockout countdown...
ACCEPTED! Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Type "ready" when you have finished discussing the temperature change data. WAIT_FOR_CHECKIN
ACCEPTED! Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk_Test01: Okay, Amy. Make sure your team agrees. ACKNOWLEDGE+to:Amy+PRIVATE_MESSAGE
adjustedPromptText: Let's switch your roles. Amy, you will be the navigator and Jack will be the driver.
accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Let's switch your roles. Amy, you will be the navigator and Jack will be the driver. PROMPT_STEP_ROTATE. Starting blockout countdown...
REJECTED!Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Moving on... ALL_READY
starting 30 second delay timer for Prompt_Step_Rotate

accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Next, click on the words "Carbon Dioxide Data" at the upper left. Examine the tables and take about 5 minutes to discuss as a team.|If someone has not yet been assigned a role, ask them to take the lead this time. Is the evidence convincing? Could there be other causes for the effects? PROMPT_STEP_CARBON_DIOXIDE. Starting blockout countdown...
ACCEPTED! Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Type "ready" when you have finished discussing the carbon dioxide data. WAIT_FOR_CHECKIN
ACCEPTED! Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk_Test01: Okay, Amy. Make sure your team agrees. ACKNOWLEDGE+to:Amy+PRIVATE_MESSAGE
adjustedPromptText: Let's switch your roles. Amy, you will be the driver and Jack will be the navigator.
accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Let's switch your roles. Amy, you will be the driver and Jack will be the navigator. PROMPT_STEP_ROTATE. Starting blockout countdown...
REJECTED!Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Okay, let's move on... ALL_READY

accepted. Message from Clem the Climate Policy Wonk: Now, click on the words "Fossil Fuels Data" at the upper left. Examine the graph and take about 5 minutes to discuss as a team.|If someone has not yet led a discussion, it's their turn to take the lead. How does this data relate to climate change? PROMPT_STEP_FOSSIL_FUELS. Starting blockout countdown...
